message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. This is a competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $9000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10500. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you and the effort I've put into preparing it.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9800? I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make a compromise to make this work.

I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $10200. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great value for the product. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to make the deal.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $9500, but no higher. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I can offer it to you for $10000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
